1141.content:
Alyson was making herself lunch in her suburban home when the shocking news arrived. As she stacked her filling in the sandwich, she suddenly herd screaming and yelling. Dropping her lunch across the floor, the tall blonde dashed towards her door, her long blond curls streaming behind her. People where running down the street in a mad frenzy, cars were crashing into one another. Feeling scared she backed inside and her ears picked up the voice of the television.
"We have confirmed reports of nuclear weaponry being dropped upon several major US cites" the newscaster read in a deathly tone "Detonations and EMP blasts have been recorded in.."
Feeling scared Alyson started to run, she fled her house. Outside people were running wild, cars collided, voices screamed and there was even in occasional gunshot. Luggage was strewn all over the streets and people hurriedly packed belongings into bags. Alyson knew where they were headed, where she had to go.

She sprinted off down the street, outpacing many of the panicking crowds. She watched a bus ram the convenience store, the driver kicking the door open and fleeing as the store began to catch fire. The throng made its way through the suburban paradise, towards the hillside path to the local vault.

Alyson ran off down into the woods, following the path she passed the tree with their falling autumn leaves. The sky roared as a Vertibird thundered overhead, tearing the leaves of the branches in a golden sandstorm. They were nearing the chain link fence that surrounded the vault. People were clustered about watching the Vertibird hovering overhead, its machine guns tracking the refugees.

Quickly Alyson approached the three guards at the entrance, all were armed and keeping the crowds at bay.
"Please" she begged a man in a Vault-Tech uniform. "You have to let me in!"
he raised an eyebrow. "are you with Vault-Tech?" he asked
1141.title: Alyson

11411.content:
"Yes! yes yes!" you gasp. You hurriedly gave you name and waited for an agonising second as the guard checked his clipboard. After a few moments, he looks up.
"She's allowed in" the guard grunts. The two other guards move aside to let you in, before blocking the rest of the crowd with their rifles. You head up the gravelled path towards the vault entrance, along with a group of other refugees. A few are carrying large amounts of luggage, while some have only the clothes your wearing.

You arrive at the vault entrance, the huge cog shaped lift to take you into the vault. You and the other people huddle on the elevator as a few stragglers join you. Excavators and rubble-shifters are parked around the entrance, along with the operations booth.

"Get ready to send them down!" yells a guard.

Suddenly there is a huge flash and you see the bomb detonate like an evil red flower. The Mushroom cloud starts to reach into the sky and the shockwaves ripple through the ground. You see a Vertibird plummet to the ground from the EMP and dust flying through the air.

Suddenly, before the shockwave reaches you, the vault opens and you plummet into the ground. The shockwave races overhead as you enter the bowels of the vault.

As you gaze in shock as the vault seals and you arrive at at a series of tunnels. A woman in a lab coat smiles.
"Welcome to vault-tech, you have been luckily selected to survive the Armageddon in safety and comfort, please step this way"

Your herded along and split off into individual rooms. You wait for a few seconds on a plain chair before a female doctor arrives.
"Hello! I'm afraid that to have a place in our vault, your going to have to put this on"

15211222.content:
Vault 85 was, by all means, a working vault. Like the handful of other still functioning vaults in the area, it had some contact with the outside world, but mostly existed independently, separate from the stories of the commonwealth. What little stories did get through however, made overseer Jacklyn Pierce glad she was on her side of the vault door. Sure there were stories of deathclaws, metal men and all sorts of horrific beasts, but what really scared her, were the stories of the other vaults of the world. From junkie riots to cryogenic freezing, Jacklyn was glad that vault 85 had such non-lethal experiments. And what experiments they were.

Vault 85, like most vaults, was all one big experiment for the people of the new world to take from when that time came. The experiment in 85 was simple, put one individual under extreme social pressure and gauge the reactions of them and their peers. The person chosen was always young, between 16 and 21 at the time of their choosing, for optimal social self-consciousness. They didn't know they'd been picked, hell, they didn't even know the experiment was happening. Once a vault-dweller reached 30 years in age they were informed of the prank, and let in on the secrets. If one was the lucky choosee of the experiment, they were often offered the job of next overseer, which was how Jacklyn got hers. Jacklyn remembered the wet bed sheets and unintentional public nudity fondly, and had decided she wouldn't trade it for the world. The one being experimented on was always female, keeping both the overseer of the project and the one being humiliated the same gender was simply a safety precaution, that the overseer might not abuse their position. The one at the core of the experiment was often the one thought to be the most squeamish, some parents tried to correct their children at a young age of such behavior, while others encouraged it, seeing the potential of having an overseer in the family. Most however, stuck to the experiment and did not alter their child's behavior either way.

Today was a big day for the vault however, as today...

She hated that last part, it sounded so robotic, and most raiders would answer with nothing pleasant.

"Uh, caravan." The voice on the other end said, this was clearly a young woman, and not one Jacklyn recognized.

"Vault 85's policy for new caravaneers is an entrance tribute as well as a full list of inventory before entrance, we accept fusion cores, water or food shipments, or anything of equal value to the vault." All of there diapers were completely unique, Maria and Lucille having rather plain diapers, and Dalia having arguably the most colorful one of all. "I was thinking, we could maximize effectiveness and minimize casualties if we make a two pronged assualt, shock troops perform an ambush, while the primary force climbs onto the nearby overpass to shoot from above, and throw explosives."

Dalia comes to a stop, thinks for a second, and says...
152233122231122212131311122121.title: Tell her

1522331222311222121313111221211.content:
"I like your style, they teach that at your NCR?" Dalia asks rhetorically. "Alright, you and Sophie are equipped with short range weapons while me and the other girls have the gear necessary, wait for our signal near their camp, and attack, we'll catch them off guard with our rifles." You continue the trek through the wasteland until you near the enemy camp. Dalia explains your plan and you and Sophie wait while the others set up. The last thing Dalia gives you is a hand grenade, to 'deliver the first blow' as she put it. Fifteen minutes later, you can see Dalia out on the over pass in between your hidden position and the Jaguar camp. As you approach it, you see not the three you were anticipating, but ten. Dalia gives the thumbs up and you toss the grenade at the fire at the camp center, and all hell breaks loose.

Your first grenade took out four, then it was just a case of picking targets and taking them out while the others caught them from behind. You got two more causalities and by the end of the fight, the Jaguar camp was destroyed and innocence station saw a single injury in the form of Sophie scraping her arm against a stick. You and Sophie set about looting the camp ground as the girls came down. You joke and laugh about how Sophie had indeed messed herself at the first sign of fire, and find some pretty good guns along the way. When Dalia comes down she too joins in the looting speaking as soon as she enters. "Nice job girls, NCR, you did a good job coming up with that plan, a few more successes and you may become my personal assistant, and plan these things full-time. Other than that, you girls can keep what you find on two conditions, it was your kill and no one of a higher rank wants it."

You, Sophie and the raiding party trek back after the whole event, and after a short stint halfway back for a collective diaper change, you make it back without incident. Your first thought is to go get something to drink in the hall, but Dalia gestures for you to follow her. "Is there something you want mommy?" You ask.

"A few things actually, one you can cut the mommy crap with me, it's Dalia, Mommy's something we make the girls say to prove to them how little they matter in comparison to us, but you, you're going somewhere, so don't get used to calling me mommy, cause you won't be for long. Two, I want you to come with me, we're planning something big and with what you've shown today, your brains will be a valuable asset to our organization."

"Yes sir, uh, ma'am, er, Dalia." You say, a little awkwardly. Dalia simply laughs it off as the two of you walk towards a room in the corner that contains Lucille's throne room. You enter a small unmarked door after Dalia, only to find Maria and Lucille standing around a situation table with all sorts of commonwealth maps.

"What's she doing here?" Maria asks with disgust.

"I brought her along, she was very valuable today, that scouting party ended up having ten members, but her good aim and tactics meant we didn't see a single casualty. We need someone to break this little tie of ours, I thought she would be a good fit." Dalia says with a surprising amount of force. You didn't think she cared that much for your abilities.

Maria laughs it off but Lucille seems impressed. "Alright, it's not like she's been around long enough to have a favorite of the three of us. She's the tiebraker."

Your confusion catches up with you, and you ask. "Tiebreaker for what?"

Maria opens her mouth, probably to scold you for not saying 'mommy'. But Dalia steps in. "We're at a crossroads right now. This war between the commonwealth factions has really opened up a lot of avenues for us, but we only have the resources for one. Being this far out of Boston means we'll probably only find trouble if we go looking for it, so we'll need to focus on one thing, in case it goes bad and we end up needing all of our forces to deal with one problem. I say, we try and fight the Jaguars, that gang we fought today. They have their own farms and have been infringing on our territory for far to long."

"And I say we focus on raiding the caravans!" Maria jumps in, "We won't need farms when we're get so rich we can all go buy our own rooms in the Diamond city upper stands."

"And I abstain, I like both plans, but I'm not about to commit to one without some counsel." Lucille says.

"So what'll it be?" Dalia asks, "The jaguars or the caravans?"
1522331222311222121313111221211.title: A fine idea young one

15223312223112221213131112212111.content:
"The Jaguars," You say. "Sustainability of the gang means more than getting rich quick. What happens if the caravans just stop coming our way before we hit the big time? Then no one will trade with us, and we'll have no way to take resources, we'll starve." In truth, you'd rather just not have to attack innocents, but your points make sense.

"I like your logic little one." Lucille says. "Dalia was right, your brain is going to do a lot for our outfit. You can go now, we've got some more things to discuss but we'll see how you are at making plans tomorrow, when you help us plan the first assault."

Upon leaving the room, you run off to go find Sophie, share some drinks, and tell her the good news. After doing just that, you fall asleep drunk. And wake up the next morning, being sent for by Dalia.

When you enter the room you were in last night, you find Dalia sitting, pouring over maps and seemingly hand-made troop tallies. Her eyes have bags and her diaper's soggy, she's been here all night. "Good, you're here. Listen, here's the deal, the Jaguars have three main strongholds, we have the force to take each one, but we only have the girls to hold one. The other problem is that we don't know how many troops are at each base, the rotate regularly, so no one knows which target is easiest and which one's the hardest. I've been thinking, and my best bet is take their central base, the tato ranch. Split their forces and take out their food supply. Any critiques?"

You look at the maps for a second, and make your comments. "A few, for one, taking the center tato farms opens us up to a two pronged attack, if we want to go take another location, part of the strike force would have to stay back to defend from the other side, and if one group gets a message to the other, we could be facing a two fronted battle. Two, if we don't have the troops to hold all three positions than the idea of a war of attrition is impossible, they have food stores in the other two locations no doubt, and if they can grow tatos at the ranch, they'll be able to grow tatos elsewhere, and as soon as we try to stop one group from growing those tatos, they take back the ranch. And we can't go salted earth, we'd lose the whole reason we're fighting this thing. No I have a different plan, we should...

A: Use shock tactics to overrun both sides, the center will be in chaos as the others retreat in

B: Commit to a massive all at once stealth attack on all three locations, it doesn't matter if we actually out gun them, we simply need to overrun them.
15223312223112221213131112212111.title: The Jaguars

choices: The Mommies have agreed with your plan
They have come up with an alternative one
152233122231122212131311122121112.content:
"If we can overrun all three bases at once we deny them their bases of operation and put us in a good position to wipe them out we can't sustain a prolonged conflict so our best bet is to do as much damage as we can straight of the bat and hope that's enough to give us the edge"

Dalia thinks for a moment and gives you a small nod

"Alright that seems like a workable plan I'll go over it with the rest of the moms I'll find you when we reach a decision"

You leave and go find yourself from food helping yourself to a meal in the cafeteria before heading down to the range to do some target practice where you find Sophie doing the same.

"How did the meeting with Mommy Dalia go?"

"It was fine was debated some ideas and I was dismissed."

"Oh, the word is you've been advancing pretty quickly and some say you might even get promoted soon."

That catches you off guard and you wonder were you really suited for this life? You advanced quickly curried favor with the bosses and even made something of a name for yourself with the rank and file but before you could deliberate any further you found yourself called up by Dalia.

You meet Dalia and find that
152233122231122212131311122121112.title: B

choices: Take over the makeshift radio tower on the second floor
Release the brahmin pen, forcing a stampede on the incoming jaguars
1522331222311222121313111221211121.content:
You enter the armory, what you now know to be no doubt Dalia's base of operations, to find her looking over similar hand drawn maps as the ones in the situation room, only these ones have troop movements drawn out. "You need me Dalia?"

"Yes Sammi, it is Sammi isn't it? I'm done calling you little one, you've earned a name here." You nod your head and feel a sudden rush of humanity. You've hardly thought about your true self since starting this. You aren't a raider, you're an NCR soldier, a taken woman with a girlfriend back at camp who's waiting for you. But here you stand, planning for this gang in which you are rising through the ranks, feeling more like yourself than you've felt in a long time, maybe not now, but soon you're going to have to evalaute what you really want for your life. "The other bosses and I are done planning, with one look at our maps, you were able to figure out a more complex plan than we could in a day, I don't know if that counts as genius where you're from, but it does at Innocence Station. You're being promoted, and not to typical grunt, you're a lieutenant now, specifically one of my lieutenants. When you get a second, change your diaper, and wear it with pride. Now, as my lieutenant, you'll be one of my field leaders as well, that means radioing to me on the situation during the battle and leading a group of the girls. I know you've found a friend in that Sophie girl, so she'll be your aide this mission. You will be helping to lead the assault on the Jaguars southernmost base, the old motel. It's not their headquarters, or their farms, so we have reason to believe you'll be attacking on the path of least resistance. I'll rally the other girls, and you'll all rally the troops, but we attack tonight. No go change, and grab your old service rifle, you'll need it."

You step into the nearby room, and move over to the far rack, farthest in the diaper part of the storage room, where you find the diapers of your rank. You pick out a pink one, only to find there are no designs on it. It makes sense, all of theses designs are post war, and until you get a design into the factory floor, you're gonna have to make the designs yourself. Thinking quickly, you write 'NCR waste disposal' in small marker on the butt, and put it on. You grab a second diaper, write an identical phrase, and put it in the canteen pack of the pink combat armor you find in the room. You grab one last poorly fitting army helmet before returning to the armory to grab your gun, where you find three other girls waiting around Dalia and her maps. "Girls, this is Sammi, she's the brains of our plan, and if this goes well, she'll have a permanent residence in our upper ranks." Dalia then looks at you and gestures to the first of three girls, a smiley blonde woman with a look of innocence aided by her rainbow colored diaper. "Sammi, this is Kayla." Next she points to an angry looking woman clad in some heavy combat armor, save the the pants, with no hair on her head. "This is princess, she won't tell us her real name. And this is Lilian." She finishes by pointing to the last girl, and frizzy haired girl with skin darker than Dalia's. "Now that we have our introductions, here's the plan. The old motel is our target of choice. For the Jaguars, it works like a trading hub, where anyone, so long as they aren't to above the board, can bring in all sorts of goods. Unfortunately for them, it's also very open. Out goal is to take the parking lot, that's where the garrison and the shops mostly are, and from there, it will be easy work flushing out the motel rooms. It has two main road entrances, as well as one rear path to what used to be a pool, and is now a watering hole. Lilian, Princess, you two are taking the two front entrances, to the north, and east respectively. Kayla and Sammi, you're the rear attack force, I want you to push in after the fighting starts to catch them by surprise and cut off escape. Kayla, you're in charge of everything, if radios are knocked out, I want you to be the next in line for command. You all have your teams, Sammi, you'e in charge of K-team, you'll find that your assistant has the manifest. Mommy Lucille is going to send us off tonight with a speech, but as soon as it's over, that's when you're leaving. Don't let anything slow you down, and make sure all radios are charged, Sammi's plan hinges on one all-out coordinated stealth assault."


The day continues and you're able to connect with Sophie, she has your troop manifest, mostly the newest recruits, as such you spend most of your day giving them the basics of unit tactics, which seems to work a little. Night comes, Lucille gives her speech about 'innocence station supremacy' and 'the end of the Jaguar' which does well to work the girls up, leading to an anxious, yet quiet crawl through the wastes. You get to the motel, and prepare for the assault. Soon you get the signal, three short bursts of radio static, and the gun fire starts from the front of the motel. Due to the darkness, you still aren't sure how many troops the Jaguars have there, but once the shooting ramps up, it seems to be more than you were anticipating. You aren't worried however, and you take Sophie and your girls through the back side into the parking lot path.

The fight is going well, until you notice a problem, in an act of bravery and skill, you single handedly...
1522331222311222121313111221211121.title: The Mommies have agreed with your plan

15223312223112221213131112212111211.content: It feels good to have your old rifle back with you, even if it being used for a petty raider war. Your first observation during the fight is that not every jaguar is directly shooting back, some are radioing in to somewhere. That won't do, you look around to see a small dish connected with a cord to one of the rooms on the second floor of the motel. In a moment of pure adrenaline, without even thinking about your own safety in this raider war, you rush for the stairs, taking out the Jaguar who was using them as cover, and run up to the second floor. You sprint across the platform, all the while taking shots at the other Jaguars up on your level. Soon, you make it to the door with the radio. Standard NCR breaching procedures requires three individuals, but your plan requires the Jaguars be in chaos, and a radio is the oppisite of chaos. You kick open the door and open fire on the two guards, as well as the radio operater. All three fall before returning a single bullet to you. You slow down, approaching the radio and letting the adrenaline subside. The smell in the room is bad, at first you think one of the raiders here messed themselves, but you realize that was you, without even noticing while on the adrenaline rush. You kick the dead radio operator out of his seat, so tired you don't even care about the mushing as you sit down in his spot, and radio in to the Jaguars around you. "Attention all Jaguars, any girl who wants to join innocence station as a raider on the winning side, can throw down her gun and pee herself. Otherwise, throw down your guns anyway, and accept surrender!" You feel exhausted, your body aches from adrenaline, and crawling, and sleeping on the floor. You look outside, the fighting is still happening, but the Jaguars are completely overrun, you did it. You also see a utility ladder leading down to a break in the fencing. You could run now, be down with it, return to the NCR, and simply say you escaped. Or you could stay, either because you've truly become a raider, or you desire to use these killers as unknowing NCR puppets. You decide to...

152233122231122212131311122121112112.content:
You look back down, the fighting has stopped. "Radioing in, this is Sammi, how is everything Kayla?" You ask.

Princess' voice answers, "Kayla's down, probably not dead, but down. That was insane, what happened just now?"

"Yeah, it's like one second, they know exactly where we are, and the next second, it's shooting fish in a barrel." Lillian adds in.

"That was me," You say, "They set up a radio tower we didn't know about, I went in and took out their communications."

"Damn, nice job new girl, I take it the whole 'pee yourself and we might let you in' was you as well? Cause I've got two in desperate need of a change here claiming they're ready to join us." Princess remarks.

"Nice job anyway," Lillian adds. "The boss is going to want to hear about this, you should radio to her yourself, seeing as Kayla can't right now."

"Yeah thinks." Princess says, "When they turned the tables on us I damn near shit myself. No, wait, I definitely did."

You chuckle and head down to the fight, where you find Sophie waiting for you at the bottom of the stairs. "Nice job boss, what's next?"

"Set up a radio for Mommy Dalia, they have a nice setup upstairs, room 2D I think. I need to speak with her." You and Sophie head up to the room you were just in and Sophie gets to work while you think about the success of your first command.

"Yes, what is it?" Dalia's voice says through the radio.

"Dalia, motel's secure, Kayla's down, but minimal other casualties. They had a radio tower we didn't know about, but I took it upon myself to disable it."

"Nice job, you and a personal detail should come back to the base, we need to look at what's next." Dalia says, sounding pleased.

"Yes Ma'am, but if it's all the same, I'll just bring my aide, we can handle ourselves, and we're at less of a threat than the motel of retaliation. This is Sammi, signing out" You say, tiredness still clawing at you. "C'mon Sopie, we've got a base to return to."

"And some diapers to change. You stink boss!" Sammi laughs.

"When we reach the halfway point how about, I want some distance between us and this place first."
152233122231122212131311122121112112.title: Stay

1522331222311222121313111221211121121.content: Light shown through the trees as Cassie moved through the waste. It was morning, not even ten o clock yet. Word was, a major conflict happened last night between two of the local raider gangs, one of which was holding Cassie's girlfriend. Cassie had tried to get a strike force for the factory, but there wasn't enough intel, and Keller said they shouldn't as it would endanger Sammi. Cassie continued to move in her reverie until a smell pulled her out. It wasn't pleasant to say the least. She looked around, hoping it was a clue to some innocence station raider, and not just radstag droppings. Sure enough, she soon found a large pink diaper, discarded on the ground. The diaper lied flat, and on the rear it read 'NCR waste disposal' That was odd. It was too small to be a slave diaper, but no one besides Sammi would know about the NCR, what was happening here?

I knew you were the right girl for the job!"

"Its just that, we don't have the troops to hold all four of our positions now, so where are we gonna recruit from?"

"Recruit, why would we recruit? We don't intend on keeping the Jaguar territory, we're just taking all of the valuables and leaving it for the birds." Lucille says.

"But why?" You ask, "someone else'll move in and we'll have to do this all over again, when we could simply take some of the girls from the Jaguars, induct them and some other wastelanders, and we'd have the troops to contain all four. We'd be an actual power to be reckoned with."

Lucille doesn't respond to that. She simply sits, and thinks. It is almost thirty seconds before she speaks, "All of you, leave me. I need to think." You, Dalia and Maria leave the room, Maria and Dalia go off in different directions, and you decide to follow one of them, you go after...

As the rest of your table awakens from their drunken stupor you and the rest of the mommies head to the planning room to discuss the future of the group.

Lucille, of course, speaks first.

"Alright, let's get down to business. Thanks to the console from our newest mommy we have successfully taken and seized the former territories of the Jaguars thanks to Sammi we also have enough troops and girls to protect them as well."

1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.content: A lot of the girls you've met, like Sophie and maybe even Dalia can still be redeemed. If you bring them to the NCR, they may all be allowed to function as a single division, and stop having to live as raiders. There are a few problems with your plan however, and you condense it down to two in your head. The first problem, is that these girls live like raiders. They fight and drink and steal, that's no way to live like in the NCR. The second you've found is the obvious one, Lucille is still in power, and while there is a slim chance that Dalia may join you, Maria and Lucille will oppose your coup. This is all also under the assumption that you're no longer fourth in power, you'll have to be the highest ranking gang member in your coup if you want to lead, but that means if you want to bring Dalia in, you'll have to surpass her. You sit there for a while, and eventually decide...

1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.content: You finally get up, get changed. And take Sophie back home. The diaper Sophie changes you into is just like the one you got last night, it looks like this is your new look, and considering your plans to return home, you can't say you don't like it. Your plan for civilization is simple, first comes the hard line. Stealing, assaulting, harassing, or otherwise acting unlawfully to other girls in the gang will result in punishment. Not the humiliation based, barbaric punishments of past, but increased labor, and stints in the rooms configured into jail cells, with the locks moved to the outside. Then will come your council, you need to maintain control, but there will be weekly assemblies, where girls from different groups will get to be on the advisory council. You intend to actually use the council, and make it into a way for the girls to have their voices heard. Of course there will be term limits, and you'll still have the control in the end, but forced discourse may make the girls more civil. Upon returning to the motel, you gather the girls, and institute the plan. Three weeks in, you've finished your third advisory council and...
1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.title: Lead by example, and turn the motel into a civi...

1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.content:
"All I'm saying is, the new recruits feel as though they're being targeted by the older trainees." Tanya, the representative of the recruits says. By the second week of your new plan, several caucuses had already formed, which was fine by you, it was rather civilized.

"And all I'm saying is, it's not the whole group, just a few bad eggs. We were recruits too once, and no one wants time in the cells." Replies Katrina, the representative for the lower class grunts who just graduated from training. The hard line civilized life style was met with almost no resistance. While fun, it was just easier to live in a world where you were free from having your ass felt for 'wetness checks' every five minutes. (That never happened to you of course, but it was a common occurrence according to the members of the first council.) "And besides, you don't even know if it's us."

"Several girls have reported getting pranked or groped at night, only to see the rear end of standard non-trainee diapers running away, you're the only one's who wear those." Tanya responds. The council has been civilized as well, no one cares enough for political assassinations, but there has still been good attendance, and three weeks of heavy training, learning the rules, and trying at democracy has softened up the girls. Not in the combat sense, but in that they all seem a little less comfortable with the idea of attacking an innocent caravan, which is exactly what you wanted.

Brook, the representative of the guard detail speaks up, "Look, why don't we just form a joint investigation, some recruits, some regulars, and some of my girls. At worst, the criminals hear about the investigation, and stop doing it to avoid punishment, at best, we get to catch some bad guys." The cherry on top to your brilliant plan has been it's affect on the other parts of the gang. Dalia's already made her council, Maria and Lucille are being pushed to make councils of their own, and the idea of a big council with representatives from every part of the gang has been thrown around. It's starting to feel a little bit more like home.

"Well I like that plan, and I think that's our last matter of business. Ladies, nice job today, and remember, if you need to call an emergency council before next week you just need to tell us." Says Sophie, recently promoted and then chosen to be representative of the groups elite. You mostly just listen, step in when things plans get to idiotic or to break a tie, it's all worked rather well. This part of the plan has been a success, now you just need to coup. You'll need support in you, and to instill doubt in Lucille's leadership. And of those, you choose first to...
1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.title: It's a bona fide success

choices: A lot more civilized than you remember
Just as barbaric as you recall
1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.content:
Your meeting today is going to be followed up with another meeting, one with the mommies. Your caravan is prepped and as soon as the meetings over you head off for the HQ.

The road there is long, but rather well maintained since the innocence station takeover. And after arriving shortly after the beginning of sunset, you enter the meeting room, last to arrive. "Good, finally, we can discuss." Lucille says, she seems a bit on edge.

"Yeah, took you long enough." Maria says, no matter what you do, she'll never like you, not that it matters anyway.

"Sorry, meeting with my advisory council ran long. Let;s get to business." You say. What follows is the usual in boringly going down a list of maintenance issues, until you finally reach the point of upcoming situations.

"So, we've settled in, all is well, and no major player has their eyes on us. What next?" Lucille asks.

"Are you kidding? We need to make for Boston proper, get our name on the map." Maria adds.

"We can't do that. In fact we should do the opposite of that, we need to lie low. We're collecting our own resources, taxing traders and farms, and no one's looking at us, yet. We need to let things sit for a while." You say, Maria's outburst played right into your plan.

"I agree, we've reached sustainability but if we're not careful we're going to make some enemies." Dalia adds, even unknowingly, she too has always been working for you.

"Alright, then let's sit, but how do we break it to the Girls that we're lying low?" Lucille asks.

There may be a day when you come to miss being able to play these conversations with the diapered women in front of you like a fiddle, but today, you just relish in it. "Isn't it obvious? Party."

The party comes, and it is...
1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.title: Make Lucille look like a bad leader

1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.content:
It's time to get to business. But first you need to create a plan. You find Sophie, passed out with her face dug into the diapered crotch of one of the girls and shake her up. With her in tow, you say your polite goodbyes to the other mommy's and stop by the armory before heading back. It's so weird to think that not so long ago you were enslaved to these girls, humiliated and objectified for their fun, and now you're the top dog. You figure the other mommy's aren't going to punish the newest member on top for taking more than she was allowed from the armory. In all the weeks since coming to really join this outfit you've hardly updated your outfit. Now, with the pick of the litter, you waddle your way around the armory, hardly even conscious that your diaper is still used, and pick out an outfit to match your rank. You grab a padded bra and a leather jacket, as well as some fishnets that have amazingly not yet ripped, (though you wonder for how much longer) and lastly, a pink tutu that hardly covers your sagging diaper. That last part is for Cassie, she always had a thing for those old world dancers, though when you return to her, you aren't quite sure how she'd think of your look now. Ignoring that thought, you also grab a few extra pink diapers and some markers, the NCR design the girls made for you is nice, but you think it could use some personal flare. Lastly you turn around to Sophie, standing quietly in the corner of the room. You've kept her as your aide this whole time, and you still have never really promoted her, not in the way that counts here at least, not in fashion. All this time later she's still in a plain, white (leaking right now) diaper. "Sophie," you say. "I'm promoting you, please, pick whatever type of diaper you want from here." Sophie looks surprised,

"Oh thank you Sammi!" She waddles over to a shelf of purple diapers and bends down to pick one up. If you weren't taken, Sophie would certainly be someone you were into, most of these raiders would scoff at you for being so monogamous, but it was important to you. And besides, now that you were mommy, they wouldn't scoff publicly, lest they wanted an hour in the stocks. Eventually Sophie pops up proudly, holding a thick, lilac diaper in her hands, you waddle over to examine it. Sophie looks somewhat worried as you snatch it from her hand and grab a marker, and begin to write.

'Business Bitch'

"Business... Bitch?" Sophie asks.

"Oh yeah," You reply, "Because we've got work to do."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------

Your walk back starts with a change, first her of you, then you of her, then of her again, as she fairly immediately wets one of her new purple diapers. But you don't mind, you spend the changes asking her questions, nothing outright seditious, Sophie is loyal to the gang after all, but mostly asking her what she knows about the mommy's, you'll need dirt or an alliance with some, if not all of them, if this is going to work. The discussion while you clean and change her in the dirt, and while you walk to the motel ends up being very informative, and you get dirt on all 3 mommies.

The info you find is fascinating, turns out Sophie's had her ear to the ground for a while, it turns out Dalia, Maria, and Lucille all have weakspots.

Dalia: already allied with you, is said to have risen from the ranks herself, but some say she misses the old lifestyle of being lower class, the crawling, the being played with, she's too important for that now, but she misses it.

Maria: Word is, she's planning a power grab of her own. All of this is just rumor though.

And Lucille: The woman on top, you'll need to work on one of the other two before her, but its said she only likes to wet her diaper, but avoids messing it if she can.

Your imind is a buzz with thoughts on what to do next, but as you approach camp, something takes you out of your thoughts. A low level recruit, clad in a baby blue pull-up and nothing else, holding a prisoner in her hand. "Boss, this lady says she knows you, and she wants to talk."

Cassie.
1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.title: The girls can shape up later, the coup itself i...

1522331222311222121313111221211121121121.content:
You motion away the recruit, even Sophie, and take Cassie by the hand and quietly lead her to your room. "Babe, what's going on?" She asks, "Why is everyone... Why are you, dressed like this?"

"I'll explain inside." You respond before making it to your door. You make it into the room and begin to deflate. This throws a wrench into things, Cassie's always been there in the back of your mind, but dealing with her now sounds exhausting, that said, she does look beautiful in the light shining in the room.

"Did you just, wet that thing?" She asks, pointing down.

You look down, your diaper is indeed wet. "What? Oh yeah, I don't even notice anymore. Look Cassie, a lot has happened since I got taken, and I mean a lot."

"Well then tell me." She says, her beautiful eyes staring into your soul.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------

It takes most of mid morning, but you finally catch her up on everything that's happened so far. You look across the room, she's sitting silently with her head down, finally, she stands up, slowly walks over to you, and...
